commit.message:
opts.c (finish_options): Do not handle -Wmissing-noreturn here.

2012-04-29  Manuel López-Ibáñez  <manu@gcc.gnu.org>

        * opts.c (finish_options): Do not handle -Wmissing-noreturn here.
        * common.opt (Wmissing-noreturn): Alias of -Wsuggest-attribute=noreturn.

From-SVN: r186943

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+2012-04-29  Manuel López-Ibáñez  <manu@gcc.gnu.org>
+
+        * opts.c (finish_options): Do not handle -Wmissing-noreturn here.
+        * common.opt (Wmissing-noreturn): Alias of -Wsuggest-attribute=noreturn.
+
 2012-04-29  Hans-Peter Nilsson  <hp@axis.com>
 
 	PR target/53156

@@ -567,8 +567,7 @@ Common Var(warn_unsafe_loop_optimizations) Warning
 Warn if the loop cannot be optimized due to nontrivial assumptions.
 
 Wmissing-noreturn
-Common Var(warn_missing_noreturn) Warning
-Warn about functions which might be candidates for __attribute__((noreturn))
+Common Alias(Wsuggest-attribute=noreturn)
 
 Woverflow
 Common Var(warn_overflow) Init(1) Warning
